name: Game of Crafts: VR Immersion in the World of Russian Folk Art
name_original: Game of Crafts: VR Immersion in the World of Russian Folk Art
description:
Put on your virtual reality goggles and let your imagination run wild. Together with an AI named Kika, go from an apprentice to a real master of Russian folk crafts. Learn the secrets of ancient artists and save Kika by bringing colors and patterns back to her home.
- Feel like an artist! Use VR controllers to select patterns and apply them to objects around you.
- Do as you like! Change the size of patterns and choose how to combine them. Nobody prevents you from decorating Kiki's house with a mixture of Zhostovo and Gzhel bouquets.
- Modernize traditions! Prove that folk crafts have not gone out of fashion. Paint a motorcycle under Khokhloma? Easily! Cover the sofa with Palekh miniatures? Why not!
- Touch history! Find out together with Kika why Gzhel was not always blue and white, and how the Zhostovo and Tagil paintings are related.
- Become an explorer! Explore the workshop and open secret niches to find new patterns.
- Learn crafting skills! Assemble the painting blanks from the parts hidden all over the place, but make sure they fit together.
